name: CloudPassage Halo
description: This app supports variety of investigative actions on CloudPassage Halo.

actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input parameters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: List all packages on a given server
actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input parameters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: List all processes on a given server
actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input parameters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: List all vulnerabilities on a given server
actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input parameters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: List all users on a given server
actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input parameters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: List all servers for a given user, process, package and vulnerability
